text: "My son", said the King, "you must never prefer human justice to divine justice. "Then, oh father", replied the Prince, "I want to eat tonight at the table of my servants. The king turned his back and said, "But don't forget that your mission includes keeping you in a certain position over your subjects, so that they don't forget that you have been given to them as King and Lord by divine justice. "In that case", replied the young Prince, "Divine justice is not the justice of good. The Commission shall adopt implementing acts in accordance with Article 21 of this Regulation.
title: La justicia
author: nan Salarrué
